main event: Observers watched a red/green, and blue colored object travel across the sky opposite the horizon in Maiden, North Carolina.
interesting points: The object was observed moving into the west and disappeared from view into three distinct sections,The upper section was noted to be red and the lower half blue and green,The disappearance of the object was abrupt and indicated a rapid movement away from the observers,Weather conditions during the sighting were described as bright yet hazy,The report concludes with insufficient data for further evaluation.
sighted object: a red/green and blue colored object
witness description: The witnesses included individuals in the area who were attentive to the sky.
